mapper.select: SELECT tc.teachClassID As teachclassid, tc.`name` AS teachclassname, tc.startDate AS startdate, tc.endDate AS enddate, c.name AS coursename, nsc.credit AS credit, cg.collegeName AS collegename, nsc.studentnumber AS teachclasscapacity FROM teachclass AS tc, course AS c, college AS cg, teacher AS t, (SELECT sc.teachClassID AS teachclassid, COUNT(*) AS studentnumber, sc.credit AS credit FROM scorerecord AS sc GROUP BY sc.teachClassID, sc.credit) AS nsc WHERE tc.teachClassID = nsc.teachclassid AND tc.courseID = c.courseID AND c.collegeID = cg.collegeID AND t.teacherID = tc.teacherID AND t.teacherID = #{techerID}

SELECT s.studentID AS studentid, s.`name` AS studentname, cg.collegeName AS collegename, m.`name` AS majorname, ac.grade AS grade, ac.classnumber AS classnumber, sc.score AS score FROM scorerecord AS sc, student AS s, adminclass AS ac, acsnamelist AS acs, college AS cg, major AS m WHERE sc.teachClassID = #{teachClassID} AND sc.studentID = s.studentID AND ac.adminClassid = acs.adminclassid AND acs.studentid = s.studentID AND cg.collegeID = m.collegeID AND ac.majorid = m.majorid

SELECT s.studentID AS studentid, s.`name` AS studentname, cg.collegeName AS collegename, m.`name` AS majorname, ac.grade AS grade, ac.classnumber AS classnumber, l.date AS `date`, l.section AS `section`, ar.type AS `type` FROM student AS s, college AS cg, teachclass AS tc, major AS m, scorerecord AS sc, tcsnamelist AS tl, adminclass AS ac, absencerecord AS ar, lesson AS l WHERE tc.teachClassID = #{teachClassID} AND s.studentID = tl.studentID AND tc.teachClassID = tl.teachClassID AND sc.teachClassID = tc.teachClassID AND sc.collegeID = cg.collegeID AND m.collegeID = cg.collegeID AND m.majorid = ac.majorid AND l.teachClassID = tc.teachClassID AND ar.lessonID = l.lessonID

SELECT c.classroomID AS classroomid, c.capacity AS capacity, cr.date AS `date`, cr.section AS `section`, u.role AS role, cr.`check` AS `check` FROM classroomrecord AS cr, classroom AS c, `user` AS u WHERE cr.user = u.username AND c.classroomID = cr.classroomID AND u.username = #{teacherID}

SELECT tc.`name` AS teachclassname, c.`name` AS coursename, l.date AS lessondate, l.section AS lessonsection, tc.startDate AS tcstartdate, tc.endDate AS tcenddate FROM teachclass AS tc, lesson AS l, course AS c WHERE tc.teacherID = #{teacherID} AND tc.courseID = c.courseID AND tc.teachClassID = l.teachClassID order by l.date asc
